trans-unit.source: You have studied, either on your own or with an instructor. You know many things and are an expert on a few topics, such as history, biology, geography, mythology, nature, or any other area of study. Learned characters typically carry a few books around with them and spend their spare time reading.
trans-unit.target: You have studied, either on your own or with an instructor. You know many things and are an expert on a few topics, such as history, biology, geography, mythology, nature, or any other area of study. Learned characters typically carry a few books around with them and spend their spare time reading.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in three areas of knowledge of your choice.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in three areas of knowledge of your choice.

trans-unit.source: Inability: You have few social graces. Any task involving charm, persuasion, or etiquette is hindered.
trans-unit.target: Inability: You have few social graces. Any task involving charm, persuasion, or etiquette is hindered.

trans-unit.source: Additional Equipment: You have two additional books on topics of your choice.
trans-unit.target: Additional Equipment: You have two additional books on topics of your choice.

trans-unit.source: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.
trans-unit.target: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.

trans-unit.source: One of the other PCs asked you to come along because of your knowledge.
trans-unit.target: One of the other PCs asked you to come along because of your knowledge.

trans-unit.source: You need money to fund your studies.
trans-unit.target: You need money to fund your studies.

trans-unit.source: You believed that the task might lead to important and interesting discoveries.
trans-unit.target: You believed that the task might lead to important and interesting discoveries.

trans-unit.source: A colleague requested that you take part in the mission as a favor.
trans-unit.target: A colleague requested that you take part in the mission as a favor.
